segments.text: I see the water pouring out of the sink, flooding the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying a plate like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the water, but she doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it’s about to tip, and the boy is reaching so high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a little happy that they’re getting away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm, like nothing bad could ever happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll ever realize what’s going on around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just waiting for disaster to strike.
segments.speaker: PAR
